item.description:
Negation Hearts, at DAMATAS New players welcome, we will teach you how to play. Do [b]not[/b] be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full. There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there. Pizzas are [b]$2.99[/b] on Monday nights.

      There is now a modest membership fee of $2.00 quarterly. the fee is for the whole group not just Kitty Whist.  " Pay online " is in the blue box on left , on the home page of the group.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Negation Hearts at DAMATAS in Salem
